title: Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse
text: > Georgia Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse FILE - In this Sept. 26, 2015, file photo, Chicago Cubs' Anthony Rizzo, back, pours champagne on team owner Thomas S. Ricketts as they celebrate the Chicago Cubs clinching a postseason berth after the Cubs' 4-0 loss to the Pittsburgh Pirates in a baseball game in Chicago. This club, inside and out, is built to finally end the franchiseâ€™s 107-year championship curse. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh, File)
